name: Just Shoot And Run
description:
In this arcade top down shooter many foes may stand in your way, but if anything goes out of hand, just shoot and run.

ARROW KEYS move your character.  Aim by moving your MOUSE and shoot with the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON. Have fun playing.

This is the first build of the game. We will update it soon, and if anyone will care about this project we'll make this into a full product with lots of levels and monsters. We already left some lore on the first area (Nomads' Land) in the data section in the menu.
